snippet: Teva said it expected to close the deal for Cephalon, valued at nearly $7 billion, by Oct. 14, subject to approval by the European Commission.
lead_paragraph: Teva said it expected to close the deal for Cephalon, valued at nearly $7 billion, by Oct. 14, subject to approval by the European Commission.

headline.main: Teva Agrees to Conditions for Drug Merger
headline.print_headline: Teva Agrees to Conditions for Drug Merger
headline.seo: Teva Agrees to Conditions for Merger With Cephalon
